pages.text: There are some peculiar recipes concocted out there, by Chefs, Alchemists, and even the odd Scholar or two- concocted for their unique properties. I haven't learned most, but here's the few I do know.

pages.title: Spicy Shivercap Skewer
pages.text: Shivercap is widely known for giving fire resistance when cooked properly.

pages.title: Honey Glazed Crepe
pages.text: The honey appears to give a regenerative effect when cooked.

pages.title: Glow Squid Soup
pages.text: Glow Squid Tentacles can give a curious effect allowing breathing underwater temporarily.

pages.title: Golden Enduria Carrot
pages.text: Some Alchemists cover their food in Gold, they claim it sustains them more. Tastes terrible.

pages.title: Glistering Melon Juice
pages.text: The only Golden food or drink that I can stand the taste of. -Lanjya
